overview: Thirteen renegade BMXers cruise the Midwest on a hunt for fresh street and skate-park terrain. Stops include Madison, Milwaukee and Appleton, Wis.; Minneapolis and Mankato, Minn.; and Mundelein, Chicago and Joliet, Ill. Features new footage, hidden bonus material and extra Joe Tiseo footage, including his memorial piece from Props Video Magazine
title: Road Fools 8: White Knuckle Extreme
